scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-thirdparty && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p _site/assets/js && for entrypoint in src/*.js; do bundle_name=$(basename $entrypoint .js); browserify -t [ stringify --extensions [ .html ] ] $entrypoint -o _site/assets/js/${bundle_name}.bundle.js; done
scripts.build-thirdparty: mkdir -p _site/assets && for dir in fonts images javascripts; do cp -R node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/${dir} _site/assets/; done && cp -R node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js _site/assets/javascripts/
scripts.test: echo No test specified, moving on.
scripts.watch: watch -d --wait 1 'npm run build-js' src & npm run serve
